CustomField.description: Calculated based on Total Score as "Cold/Warm/Hot/Sizzling"
CustomField.formula: IF( I_RM_Total_Score__c>75 , 'Sizzling', IF( I_RM_Total_Score__c<=75&& I_RM_Total_Score__c>50 , 'Hot',IF( I_RM_Total_Score__c<=50&& I_RM_Total_Score__c>25 , 'Warm','Cold')) )
CustomField.label: Rank
